warning.title: &uefisecboot; requirements
warning.para: To use &productname; on systems with &uefisecboot; enabled, the complete boot chain stack (shim, GRUB, and kernel) must be provided by &suse;. This is necessary because &uefisecboot; requires a strict chain of trust, where each component—from the firmware to the kernel and its drivers—must be signed with a key that the previous component in the chain explicitly trusts. Using non-&suse; components could break this chain and prevent the system from booting.
